articles.title: A movie theater will not fast-forward a same-sex kiss in 'Lightyear' after all - CNN
articles.description: The notice outside of the 89er Theater in Kingfisher cautioned parents about a scene that depicts two female characters sharing a brief kiss, according to CNN affiliate KTUL. A theater owner told CNN the sign was a mistake that won't happen again.
